title: Syllabus mentioned in ERP
text: Advanced Engineering ThermodynamicsReview of laws of thermodynamics. Energy concepts for closed and open systems. Minimization of entropy generation principle and thermodynamic optimization. Exergy analysis of thermal systems and plants. Thermo-economic applications. Phase transition. Equations of state. Multi-component and multi-phase system. Reactive systems. Kinetic theory of gases. Distribution of molecular velocities and energy, transport properties of gases. Principles of irreversible thermodynamics and applications.
